sentences.sContent: There are dilatation of blood sinus, hemolysis, macrophage reactions erc.
sentences.sContent_eng: There are dilatation of blood sinus, hemolysis, macrophage reactions erc.
sentences.sCn: 脾血窦扩张、溶血及巨噬细胞反应等现象；

sentences.sContent: A decreased RBC mass (anemia) may be caused by blood loss, hemolysis, or decreased production.
sentences.sContent_eng: A decreased RBC mass (anemia) may be caused by blood loss, hemolysis, or decreased production.
sentences.sCn: 红细胞数量降低（贫血）可能是由于失血，溶血，或产生数量减少。

synos.tran: [生理][免疫]溶血（现象）；血细胞溶解

words.tran: [生化] 溶血素，溶红血球素（等于haemolysin）
